General.Name: Keshun Waterproof Technologies Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Keshun Waterproof Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of new building waterproof materials. It offers waterproof coiled materials, waterproof coatings, mortar coatings, sealing materials, construction materials, geotechnical materials, plastering plasters, and system solution equipment. It also provides building shock absorption and isolation, and waterproof engineering construction services. Keshun Waterproof Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.
General.Address: No. 38, Hongqi Middle Road, Foshan, China, 528303
